CustomField.description: Tracks whether the partner has responded to contract-related requests for information. Automatically checked when the contract status changes to 'Requested Legal Info', 'Sent', or 'In Negotiation (Partner)', and manually unchecked when the partner replies.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This box is checked when we are waiting for a response from the partner regarding contract negotiations. Uncheck this box manually once the partner has acknowledged or provided the requested information.
CustomField.label: No Response
